entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:41 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sparwood Airport 07:41 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: ESE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow this morning. Snow mixed with rain beginning early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm near Fernie. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm near Fernie. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Flurries. Windy. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
